alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 03 at 12:41PM MST until October 03 at 1:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 130 PM MST. * At 1240 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Williams, or 35 miles west of Flagstaff, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Coconino County. This includes State Route 64 between mile markers 190 and 202. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
